original_text: The good man is perished out of the earth: and there is none upright among men: they all lie in wait for blood; they hunt every man his brother with a net.
korean_text: 경건한 자가 세상에서 끊어졌고 정직한 자가 사람들 가운데 없도다 무리가 다 피를 흘리려고 매복하며 각기 그물로 형제를 잡으려 하고

sentences.original_text: The good man is perished out of the earth
and there is none upright among men
they all lie in wait for blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 피를 흘리기 위해 복병이 되어 기다린다

sentences.original_text: they hunt every man his brother with a net
